title: Does Iceland pay $5,000 a month to immigrants who marry Icelandic women?
subtitle: Unreliable sources on the Internet claimed that Iceland, because of the shortage of men, offered to pay immigrants to take Icelandic women as brides.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In view of the shortage of men, Iceland will pay $5,000 per month to immigrants who marry Icelandic women.
